definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: You are the point of golden section in my life, loving me to the perfect degree.
sentences.chinese: 你是我生命中的黄金分割点，恰到好处的爱着我。

sentences.english: The Golden Mean Miracle is in the Mecca Verse of the Koran.
sentences.chinese: 黄金分割的奇迹也存在于古兰经中关于麦加的章节里。

sentences.english: Golden style points and how to design with it?
sentences.chinese: 黄金分割点与设计的造型该如何结合呢？

sentences.english: Research on filtration of extraction technics of Salvia miltiorrhiza Bge. using golden section method;
sentences.chinese: 介绍了黄金分割法在制冷与采暖中的部分应用实例。

sentences.english: Gold section scale is one of the numeral scale relations which has the effect of the visual scale harmony.
sentences.chinese: 黄金分割比例即是使视觉比例和谐的数字关系之一。

sentences.english: Seurat attached most of canvas by the Golden Section.
sentences.chinese: 瑟拉帆布最重视的黄金分割。

sentences.english: The Golden Section appears time and time again within Bonsai rules.
sentences.chinese: 黄金分割在盆景规则中反复出现。

sentences.english: Optimizing extraction process of Scutellaria barbata by golden section method;
sentences.chinese: 介绍了黄金分割法在制冷与采暖中的部分应用实例。

definition: line (in drawing, calligraphy etc)/the lines or contours of a three-dimensional object (hairstyle, clothing, car etc)
